finrank_linear_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/

--TODO: this should follow from `linear_equiv.finrank_eq`, that is over a field.
/-- The finrank of `M →ₗ[R] N` is `(finrank R M) * (finrank R N)`. -/
theorem finrank_linear_hom : finrank R («expr →ₗ[ ] » M R N) = finrank R M * finrank R N := by
  classical
    letI := nontrivial_of_invariant_basis_number R
    have h := linear_map.to_matrix (choose_basis R M) (choose_basis R N)
    let b := (matrix.std_basis _ _ _).map h.symm
    rw [finrank, dim_eq_card_basis b, ← cardinal.mk_fintype, cardinal.mk_to_nat_eq_card, finrank, finrank,
      rank_eq_card_choose_basis_index, rank_eq_card_choose_basis_index, cardinal.mk_to_nat_eq_card,
      cardinal.mk_to_nat_eq_card, fintype.card_prod, mul_comm]
#align finrank_linear_hom finrank_linear_hom
